title: Colour Idioms
instructions: Work in pairs using one phone between you. Both of you can see the cards all the time. The left-hand counter belongs to player A, the right-hand counter belongs to player B. Take turns to rephrase the sentence at the top using the key word in capital letters. Click on "Answer" to see a correct solution and activate the scoring buttons. They will be flashing in red. Then make a decision together: if a solution deserves a reward (2 points), click on the active counter, otherwise click on "Next" to see another card. Before checking the answer you can also choose to click on "Clue" to get a hint: the phrase with the key word that your're expected to use in your solution. However, if you have used this, clicking on the counter will give you 1 point only. The counter buttons are only active when the answer is displayed. In short: 1) the active player comes up with a solution (using the "Clue" button if necessary), 2) players check a possible correct answer together, 3) they assess the active player's solution

cards.answer: The job was offered to her out of the blue.
